Articles.Content:
Floor 921 : (since megatiger's floor is actually 920)

You observe a room full of green creatures sitting in cryo chambers with a bunch of scientist in lab coats trying to figure out how to unfreeze them.
floor 922: this entire floor is a nuke and the beam of exterminus is 50% charged, and will finish at 923.

Floor 923: You are passed on the stairs by a group of burly kerbals in uniforms which say "security" across the back, who thunder grumpily downwards while muttering something about "gosh darn bionicles in the building again." As you continue up the stairs, you think you hear faint sounds of breaking glass and rending steel below.

Edited October 2, 2014 by GreeningGalaxy
Floor 924: You find a crashed UFO and 2 aliens trying to figure out how to repair the ship.

Floor 925: You find some offices...

... umm, with explosives inside! DUNDUNDUNDUNDUN
926: you fall back down to 920 after getting shoved out by space marines going to help the BIONICLES after landing on the roof. (space marines are in no way BIONICLES)
wait I mean you fall to floor 42 sorry

42: The information about life, the universe, and everything makes you so excited that you bounce back up to 927.

(Seriously, no going down, and if I catch you going down, I'll make a post getting us back up.)
927: you find mud. The mud is so disgusting and smelly it makes you run to 928.

928: You find yet more mud, but it doesn't smell. However, there are some waders laying next to the mud. You put them on and go in. As you reach the middle of the mud, you sink over the tops of the waders and mud flows in. You realize you're stuck, but you can, however, wade out of the mud without them on, so you do, and as you reach the edge of the mud, you see the waders disappear. You call a wader rescue team when you're on floor 931.

Edited October 4, 2014 by Sun
930: You find a telescope. It works pretty well at this altitude.
Floor 931: You see the wader rescue team from floor 928, with your mud-covered waders, which you put on and wear during the rest of your climb without being washed.
Floor 932: Thank goddesses a shower. Your other self decides to proceed to shower off all the mud.

Floor 933: You see a bunch of B.A.S.E. jumpers go hurtling past the windows, wearing wingsuits. How much higher thy jumped from is anyone's guess, but based off how far away from the building they are, probably a long ways up.
Floor 934: With mirrors everywhere, you can see that your waders still did not get cleaned, not even by the shower on Floor 932.
Floor 935 : You find one big empty room with nothing in it, no stairs nothing, so you bust a hole in the roof and reach up, something strange touches your hand...

Floor 936-940: These floors, and space is visible. Turns out, the floors were destroyed by a nuclear explosion. However, quantum physics are holding oxygen in the level, but with zero gravity, so you jump to floor 941.
941: there's a memorial here stating "Pearl Harbor never4get 1941 only 1k more flors!!one" on this floor.
942. there is a security room on this floor showing the security guards trapped between the BIONICLES and space marines on floor 42.
943. There is a room on this floor that is locked and has a big red button that when pressed will destroy the world
944. you find a necromancy lab with 2 space marines and the body of alemango12 on the floor. look like the mods have decided to start SERIOUS enforcement
Floor 944: Floor 945 collapses down upon the former 944, removing the frivolous rantpost and becoming the new 944.
945: A post here saying: 'Floor 946'
946: There are no rooms here.
946: 947 crushes the boring no rooms floor
